item.title: Book Review - A World Without Email
item.description: A World Without Email (AWWE) is Cal Newport’s new book arguing against the rapid response communication style that permeates the modern workplace. This topic is a natural follow up to Newport’s previous two books – Deep Work and Digital Minimalism. These books focused on the individual benefits of hard focused effort and deliberately reducing use of (in particular, social) technology respectively, and this book applies a similar lens to the modern frenetic (Newport likes the term hyperactive hivemind) knowledge economy workplace.
